inputs.selection_motivation: A significant Ether price surge attracts heightened attention from malicious actors, increasing the frequency and sophistication of security threats targeting the Ethereum ecosystem.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Ether price surges are driven by crypto-market liquidity, stablecoin flows, on-chain data feeds, and macro-inflation/regulatory signaling that influence risk sentiment; the following topics are the strongest plausible influencers, correlates, or peers.

proposed_link.motivation: A significant Ether price surge attracts heightened attention from malicious actors, increasing the frequency and sophistication of security threats targeting the Ethereum ecosystem.
